Module mutiny.zero

Package mutiny.zero

package mutiny.zero
Mutiny Zero is minimal API for creating reactive streams compliant Flow.Publisher objects.

ZeroPublisher offers factory methods for creating Flow.Publisher, with the Tube API and the create(mutiny.zero.TubeConfiguration, java.util.function.Consumer) factory method being the safe, general-purpose choice.

Other factory methods provide simple abstractions over in-memory data structures and special cases. There is also a bridge with the CompletionStage APIs.
